summary: Mega Man is a super-popular video game series from Japan, created by Capcom. It started in 1987 on the Nintendo Entertainment System. The games follow the adventures of the hero, Mega Man. There are over 50 games in the franchise, with the main series having 11 titles. The story continues in different series like Mega Man X and Mega Man Legends. Some spin-offs, like Mega Man Battle Network, focus on internet-based worlds instead of robots. Mega Man has been a gaming icon for over 30 years, with fans worldwide.
title: Mega Man
